data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Cascades.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cascades, Burkina Faso
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 55,542 believers in the state of Cascades with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, move the 55,542 believers in the state of Cascades to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Cascades
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Dogoso people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Dogoso people know you.
Lord we pray you unite the 55,542 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Cascades.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Cascades, Burkina Faso.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 55,542 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

location.name: Cascades
location.people_groups_list: Dyan, Tiefo, Toussian, Southern, Khisa, Karaboro, Western
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dyan (32,000), Tiefo (27,000), Toussian, Southern (39,000), Khisa (6,800), Karaboro, Western (67,000)
